
                            
                            <p>不知道有没有人发过，我反正刚知道。工行app我的，权益中心，i豆乐园和新动有礼，2个地方进去，做任务抽奖，新动有礼好像只有一个地方能做，我下面图片有圈起来。我得了几千i豆。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/112034wv3s5t5ah3sz283y.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/112034wv3s5t5ah3sz283y.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/112040i26vx6hxz56q2h56.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/112040i26vx6hxz56q2h56.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/112045f0595zeeh4uh1e5i.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/112045f0595zeeh4uh1e5i.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p>
